name: A Platformer Story
description:
A platformer story is a simple game. The objective is to reach the flag post located above.  Although the game has very little to achieve, the objective behind creating such a straightforward prototype was to experiment without using Unity's default Nvidia Physx.

Controls:

Move Left - LeftArrow/A

Move Right - RightArrow/D

Move Up - UpArrow/W

Move Down - DownArrow/S

Jump - Spacebar

Camera- Mouse Drag

Mechanics implemented:

- Finite State Machine Behaviour

- Kinematic Physics

- Double Jump

- Player Hover

- Pass through platforms

- Platforms that don't allow passthrough

- Pivoting (See Saw) Platform

- AABB Collisions

- Smooth Camera Control

- Fall damage

Technologies used:

- Unity Engine

- C#
